input.command:
cd /home/user/project && echo "This is a comprehensive test document for the translation system. It contains multiple paragraphs and sentences to test the translation quality.

This second paragraph demonstrates that the system can handle multi-paragraph content properly and maintain the structure during translation.

The final paragraph ensures that longer documents are processed correctly and efficiently." > temp/uploads/comprehensive_test.txt
